Furniture for life

It's our mission to create designs you'll want to keep forever. It looks like you’re interested in beautiful furniture design. We share your passion. So let us introduce ourselves. Swoon is a design-led furniture brand, founded in 2012 to give home lovers original pieces they'll want to keep forever.

Furniture collection

The Studio, our in-house design team, works tirelessly to create original pieces that fuel your home obsession. We then select only the best pieces to curate into collections. From a sofa to a sideboard, we’re in pursuit of perfection.

Furniture collection

Our in-house design team is relentless in searching for new designs that our customers will love. We do this through batches of limited-edition design drops each month.

Aesthetic
Crafted Furniture

We love Art Deco furniture, with its bold geometric lines and silky sharp detailing. Many of our bestselling designs are inspired by this era.
